General.Name: Shenzhen Hopewind Elec Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Hopewind Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, sale, and service of energy and electric drive products. It offers wind power devices, such as doubly-fed converters, full power converters, and energy management system; energy storage system; solar inverter, including central inverters, string inverters, and transformer-inverter integration solution; grid simulator; and VFD, as well as remote intelligent O&M system. The company also provides static var generators products. Its products are used in residential, C&I, utility, metallurgy, petrochemical, mining machinery, railway infrastructure and other industries. Shenzhen Hopewind Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

2.Name: Mr. Dang Sheng  Zhou
2.Title: Chief Engineer & Member of the Supervisory Board
